Title: ‘Creative economy  vital contributor to GDP’
Summary: The Executive Director and Founder of Africa Fashion Week (AFW) Nigeria and London, Queen Ronke Ademiluyi-Ogunwusi, stated that the creative industry has become a significant contributor to Nigeria's gross domestic product (GDP)

Title: Expected yuletide rally, others lift capitalisation by N1.3tr
Summary: Expected yuletide rally, others lift capitalisation by N1.3tr . Expected year-end rally, other transactions lift market capitalisation up . Nixix recovered from previous session losses .

Title: Cost of living crisis lingers despite GDP growth, says CPPE
Summary: The Centre for the Promotion of Private Enterprise (CPPE) said the negative social impact of economic reforms has continued to weigh on households . CPPE said it said negative social impacts of reforms have continued to hit households .

Title: Nigeria tech firm bags Microsoft award
Summary: Task Systems Limited has been honoured with the Microsoft Best Partner Award . Task Systems was founded 38 years ago, a member of the Zinox Group and one of the pioneers..

Title: ITU members set four-year plan to connect 2.2b offline people
Summary: Member states of the International Telecommunication Union (ITU) agreed on a roadmap to bring connectivity to everyone at the just-concluded World Telecommunication Development Conference (WTDC-25) in Azerbaijan .

Title: BOI disburses N1.27tn to 14 sectors, supports 900,000 jobs
Summary: Bank of Industry disbursed over N1.27 trillion to enterprises across 14 key sectors of the economy in 2024 . The move directly and indirectly supported more than 900,000 jobs nationwide . BOI’s Managing Director/Chief Executive Officer, Dr Olasupo, disclosed this yesterday during Day 2 of the 10th Nigeria

Title: Cost of a Healthy Diet rises 27% to N1,611/day
Summary: Cost of a Healthy Diet (CoHD) rose by 27.3 percent year-on-year, YoY, to N1,611 per adult per day in July 2025 . The National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) disclosed this in its CoHD report for July 2025.

Title: FG warns IOCs: Fast-Track field development or step aside
Summary: Federal Government warns IOCs: Fast-track field development or step aside . According to the FG, accelerating real activity—not dormant licences—remains critical to boosting crude production .

Title: ​Dollar to Naira exchange rate today, December 3, 2025​
Summary: The Naira opened trading at the official window at ₦1,448.43 per dollar . Data from the FMDQ Securities Exchange reveals that the exchange rate is currently at 1,448 .

Title: Pressure Nigeria to abolish Sharia Law, disband Hisbah  —  Expert tells US lawmakers
Summary: Obadare warned that “the deadliest and most serious threat confronting the Nigerian state today is jihadist terror .” The deadliest threat confronting Nigeria is the threat of jihadist terror, he said . The Nigerian government should abolish Sharia Law, disband Hisbah, he added .

Title: Peru presidential hopeful survives gun attack
Summary: Peruvian presidential hopeful Rafael Belaunde escaped bloodied but not seriously hurt from an attack by gunmen on his car . Title: FG contractors launch fresh protest over N500bn debt
Summary: Local contractors under the All Indigenous Contractors Association of Nigeria returned to the Federal Ministry of Finance on Tuesday, blocking both entrances as they pressed for the payment of what they described as long-overdue debts for completed government projects . Title: Drug trafficking: Nigerian, accomplice  jailed 37 years in S’Africa
Summary: Victor Udoh and his female accomplice, Vuyisekha Mzwakhe, will spend a combined 37 years in prison after a South African court found them guilty of drug trafficking . Title: Wasteful projects draining Nigeria’s public finances – CIPMN
Summary: Chartered Institute of Project Managers of Nigeria warns of growing danger associated with rising global and domestic financial waste on projects that require corrective works or adjustments after commissioning . Title: Anti-Tinubu post: Sowore arraigned, released on self-recognition
Summary: Omoyele Sowore was arraigned before a Federal High Court in Abuja by the Department of State Services over alleged cybercrime offences .
